reasoning: Exudative (wet) AMD accounts for ~10% of all AMD cases but 80% of severe vision loss. Global AMD prevalence ~280 per 100k in 50+ population. Wet AMD affects ~28 per 100k in this age group. Annual incidence of wet AMD conversion from dry AMD ~5.8 per 100k. Both metrics reported as this is chronic condition with incident cases.
source: Wong WL et al. (2014). Global prevalence of age-related macular degeneration and disease burden projection. Lancet. 384(9941):254-266
